item.title: Github repositories
item.description: The entire project is developed in several repositories. Atlas - the core tool that simplifies the work for the specification editor, data publisher and data consumer by integrating other tools for the toolset. Dataspecer tools - enables the specification editor to create interoperable data specifications supporting various data formats while preserving mappings of compliant data to existing ontologies and vocabularies. The MM tools - multi-model data modeling and transformations built around the categorical representation to enable users to do cross-model querying or evolution management.
